About.body: Our objective is to ensure a unique experience for travelers by granting them access to exclusive discounts and privileges offered by our partners across various industries

Why_us.body: Our specialists will be happy to share their expertise based on knowledge of what is currently working on the market.
Why_us.first_block: Your business will receive additional sales by participating in our program. Tourists who have our card are actively looking for offers and discounts, which helps increase your turnover.
Why_us.second_block: We value the uniqueness of each business. UDC offers flexible terms of cooperation, allowing our partners to choose the best cooperation options that suit their needs and strategy.
Why_us.third_block: UDCARD provides extensive marketing support to its partners, including advertising campaigns, social media and press releases. We actively promote our partners' offers, ensuring maximum visibility

Scheme.body: UDC company: places information about you on the website, develops packaging and instructions for a gift certificate, finds a client, sells a certificate valid for 1 month and transfers you the agreed amount you: Receive money and serve the client at the agreed time

Services.desc: Increasing clients among new tourists who fly to our country and attracting relocants who live here
Services.descSavings: Our specialists help your brand with advertising for foreigners. You do not spend extra money for this.
Services.descEffective: We help you get the most out of your business. Our specialists will help you identify areas that are of interest to your potential buyers, and together with you will develop a plan to attract more buyers.

FirstBlock.header: Partners where you can purchase our cards

SecondBlock.header: Partners where you can get discounts on our cards
